Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle
  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a triangle object in 2D space. Used to check various triangle characteristics and compare to another triangle class.
    Version:
    V2
    Author:
    Roman Rapoport

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double EPSILON
      constant EPSILON.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Triangle()
      Constructor Instantiates a new default triangle.
      Triangle​(double point1, double point2, double point3, double point4, double point5, double point6)
      Constructor Instantiates a new triangle based on 3 points where each point consists of 2 doubles (X,Y)
      Triangle​(Point point1, Point point2, Point point3)
      Constructor Instantiates a new triangle based on 3 points where each point is a point class object that represents X,Y values of the point
      Triangle​(Triangle other)
      Copy constructor Instantiates a new Triangle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle()
        Constructor Instantiates a new default triangle.

      • Triangle

        public Triangle​(Point point1,
                Point point2,
                Point point3)
        Constructor Instantiates a new triangle based on 3 points where each point is a point class object that represents X,Y values of the point
        Parameters:
        point1 - the point 1 of the triangle
        point2 - the point 2 of the triangle
        point3 - the point 3 of the triangle

      • Triangle

        public Triangle​(double point1,
                double point2,
                double point3,
                double point4,
                double point5,
                double point6)
        Constructor Instantiates a new triangle based on 3 points where each point consists of 2 doubles (X,Y)
        Parameters:
        point1 - the point 1 X value
        point2 - the point 1 Y value
        point3 - the point 2 X value
        point4 - the point 2 Y value
        point5 - the point 3 X value
        point6 - the point 3 Y value

        Copy constructor Instantiates a new Triangle.
        Parameters:
        other - triangle object

        public boolean isLocated()
        Is located boolean.
        Returns:

      • isAbove

        public boolean isAbove​(Triangle other)
        Is above boolean.
        Parameters:
        other - the triangle object to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the triangle is fully above the compared to triangle otherwise return false
